languages.text: {n}Искоса взглянув на вас, Авель печально произносит:{/n} "Самопожертвование не должно быть напрасным".
{n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says sorrowfully,{/n} "Self-sacrifice must not be in vain."
languages.original_text: {n}Искоса взглянув на вас, Авель печально произносит:{/n} "Самопожертвование не должно быть напрасным".

languages.text: {n}アベルはあなたを横目で流し見ると、悲しい声で言う。{/n}「自己犠牲を無駄にしてはならない」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says sorrowfully,{/n} "Self-sacrifice must not be in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルはあなたを横目で流し見ると、悲しい声で言う。{/n}「自己犠牲を無駄にしてはならない」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯瞥了你一眼，悲伤地说道。{/n}“自我牺牲绝不能白白浪费。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says sorrowfully,{/n} "Self-sacrifice must not be in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯瞥了你一眼，悲伤地说道。{/n}“自我牺牲绝不能白白浪费。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel vous jette un regard en coin avant d'ajouter sur un ton affligé :{/n} « Le sacrifice de soi ne doit pas être vain. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says sorrowfully,{/n} "Self-sacrifice must not be in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel vous jette un regard en coin avant d'ajouter sur un ton affligé :{/n} « Le sacrifice de soi ne doit pas être vain. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel te mira de soslayo y dice apesadumbrado:{/n} «Los sacrificios personales no deben ser en vano».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says sorrowfully,{/n} "Self-sacrifice must not be in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel te mira de soslayo y dice apesadumbrado:{/n} «Los sacrificios personales no deben ser en vano».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel blickt dich von der Seite her an und sagt traurig:{/n} "Selbstaufopferung darf nicht umsonst sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says sorrowfully,{/n} "Self-sacrifice must not be in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel blickt dich von der Seite her an und sagt traurig:{/n} "Selbstaufopferung darf nicht umsonst sein."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel sana yan bir bakış atıp hüzünle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bireysel fedakârlık boşa yapılmamalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says sorrowfully,{/n} "Self-sacrifice must not be in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel sana yan bir bakış atıyor ve hüzünle konuşuyor:{/n} "Bireysel fedakârlık boşa gitmemeli."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
